title: Why do I get demoted when someone disconnects at level 3? Does Riot care about things like this?

replies.body:
Not going to happen because this *guarantees* people would start dodging games strategically in order to lessen the blow by a legitimate loss.

What you're asking for would result in more AFKing overall, not less.

Basically this, it would be abused by those people who are just nice enough. or people who ended up getting bullied out. 

point is, people get unlucky, that's life, deal with it.
